ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] RESTful way to pop first item in a queue

On Thu, Aug 5, 2010 at 3:53 PM, Eb <amaeze@...> wrote:

> Does DELETE /foo/top suffice?
>
> The resource at the top of the queue is removed and another item replaces.
>

No. Because DELETE is defined to be idempotent, ie one call should have the
same effect as N calls.

-- Nick

--0016e6dd8987c39c37048d195f61
